activities: We provide our customers with online advertising technology that tracks end-user impression, click, and conversion data and helps customers evaluate the effectiveness of their ad campaigns. For our customers doing business or located in the EU and/or Switzerland we process and manage account data, including information about advertising campaigns, publisher names, and advertiser records. All customer and end-user data is distributed and stored in servers located in the United States.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer account data, end-user data, including device identifiers and IP Addresses.
recoursemech: Initially we implement internal recourse mechanisms, but if such mechanisms do not resolve such dispute then we work with eTRUST. As a 3rd party dispute resolution service, eTRUST will cooperate and comply with the EU DPAs and the Swiss FDPIC to investigate all unresolved complaints, regardless of the type of data involved.
